dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3558 IH: Veteran Jobs Training Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Neguse introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the authorization of appropriations for homeless veterans reintegration programs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veteran Jobs Training Act.

section.header: Increase of authorization of appropriations for homeless veterans reintegration programs
section.text: Section 2021(i)(1) of title 38, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (G), by striking fiscal year 2024 and each fiscal year thereafter and inserting each of fiscal years 2024 and 2025; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: $75,000,000 for fiscal year 2024 and each fiscal year thereafter.
